```{r}
article <- read.csv("ArticleExperimentData.csv")
head(article)

numpad <- read.csv("NumpadExperimentData.csv")
head(numpad)

weather <- read.csv("WeatherExperimentData.csv")
weather = subset(weather, select = -c(Time_To_First_Guess))
head(weather)
```

![]()

```{r}
long_data <- rbind(article, numpad, weather)
long_data
```

![]()

```{r}
balanced_long_data <- subset(long_data, userID!= 85)
balanced_long_data <- subset(balanced_long_data, userID!= 56)
head(balanced_long_data)

```

```{r}
bxp <- ggboxplot(
  balanced_long_data, x = "Application", y = "Time",
  color = "Mode", palette = "jco"
  )
bxp
```

ggboxplot(my_data, x = "Mode", y = "Time", color = "Application", palette = "jco")
```

outliers <- balanced_long_data %>% group_by(Application, Mode) %>% identify_outliers(Time)
outliers
```

balanced_long_data %>%

```

```

balanced_long_data %>%
  group_by(Application) %>%
  levene_test(Time ~ Mode)
```

box_m(balanced_long_data[, "Time", drop = FALSE], balanced_long_data$Application)
```

```{r}
library(plyr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggpubr)
library(rstatix)
library(emmeans)
library(phia)       #testInteractions
library(tidyr)      #spread
library(ARTool)     #art, artlm
```

```{r}
long_data$Mode = factor(long_data$Mode)
long_data$Application = factor(long_data$Application)
long_data$userID = factor(long_data$userID)
```

```{r}

ggplot(long_data, aes(x=Application, y=Time)) + geom_bar(stat = "summary", fun = "mean", fill="lightsteelblue") + geom_errorbar(stat="summary", fun.data="mean_se", fun.args = list(mult = 1.96))

ggplot(long_data, aes(x=Mode, y=Time)) + geom_bar(stat = "summary", fun = "mean", fill="lightsteelblue") + geom_errorbar(stat="summary", fun.data="mean_se", fun.args = list(mult = 1.96))
# all data in box plots: 
ggboxplot(long_data, x = "Mode", y = "Time", color = "Application", palette = "jco")

res.aov <- anova_test( data = long_data, dv = Time, wid = userID, between = Mode, within = Application)
get_anova_table(res.aov)

pwc <- long_data %>% group_by(Application) %>% pairwise_t_test(Time ~ Mode, p.adjust.method = "bonferroni")
pwc

m <- art(data = long_data, Time ~ Mode * Application + Error(userID))
anova(m)

pairwise_comp <- contrast(emmeans(artlm(m,"Mode"), ~ Mode), method = "pairwise")
pairwise_comp

```

```{r}
ggplot(long_data, aes(x=Application, y=Guesses)) + geom_bar(stat = "summary", fun = "mean", fill="lightsteelblue") + geom_errorbar(stat="summary", fun.data="mean_se", fun.args = list(mult = 1.96))

ggplot(long_data, aes(x=Mode, y=Guesses)) + geom_bar(stat = "summary", fun = "mean", fill="lightsteelblue") + geom_errorbar(stat="summary", fun.data="mean_se", fun.args = list(mult = 1.96))
# all data in box plots: 
ggboxplot(long_data, x = "Mode", y = "Guesses", color = "Application", palette = "jco")

get_anova_table(res.aov)

pwc <- long_data %>% group_by(Application) %>% pairwise_t_test(Guesses ~ Mode, p.adjust.method = "bonferroni")
pwc

m <- art(data = long_data, Guesses ~ Mode * Application + Error(userID))
anova(m)

pairwise_comp <- contrast(emmeans(artlm(m,"Mode"), ~ Mode), method = "pairwise")
pairwise_comp
```
